name: 5TD
description:
In Totally Accurate Table Top Tower Defense, the player, as a strategist in his war room, simulates different battle scenarios on a war table. In each stage, a Castle has to be defended from different waves of incoming enemies. It is possible to move units, to perform upgrades and, most of all...to lift and move turrets (if your unit is strong enough). Take the control of the battlefield by placing your turrets on strategic points and prevent invaders to destroy your castle!

In this playable build, it is possible to play a short tutorial explaining the game’s core mechanics and the first 3 levels.

DEVELOPED BY:

HUMAN FACTOR TEAM (EVENT HORIZON SCHOOL TURIN, YEAR 2, 2019/2020)

  • Luigi Alessandria
